alert.note: Alert for Gilmer (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilmer County through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Mountaintown, or near Ellijay, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ellijay, East Ellijay, Talona, Cartecay, Tails Creek, Mountaintown, Roy and Roundtop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central Georgia.
